### Question 8

```{r new-variables}
houses <- houses %>%
  filter(bedrooms <= 5 ) %>%
  mutate(floorsCat = as.factor(floors), 
         sqftCent = sqft - mean(sqft), 
         bedroomsCent = bedrooms - mean(bedrooms),
         bathroomsCent = bathrooms-mean(bathrooms),
         logprice = log(price))
```
